author: Richard norton
content: I served on the clamagore and was on the decommissioning crew.hate to see her go

author: Tom Murnane TMC(SS) USN Ret.
content: A great part of Submarine History. I hope it can be saved. I severed od 6 Submarines.

author: Captain David Bowley
content: Better aground than sunk! Good luck vets.
